twentyforty, cheers. Your postings are always sort after by myself and of course others. May I ask what software you are using to convert? I have a Twin TV Tuners in a laptop...And use a 2 pass to cut Windows MTV Recordings in size and cut Commercials and Covert to MPEG4 file (.mp4) with MCEbuddy 1.1 beta1. This does not always work well. And  does not convert to MKV. What do you use for that please?

@megodtoo: I use my own, and my toolchain is too simple to be of any use for public - it's completely command-line based.
Many people followed my advice and got HandBrake. It's open-source, free, very good and - has GUI. Cross-platform (PC, Mac, Linux).  Just Google. (and I do not know too much about, this is not a right place).
